page.title: 15Farming in Shutford
page.content: Monastery Farm; 193 acres, 84 owned, 109 rented. It is a livestock farm, 50 Friesian cows for milking. The milk goes to the dairy in Oxford. 42 beef cattle mainly Hereford and Friesian. Grange Farm; 33 acres, 23 owned, 10 rented. Arable wheat and barley grown. Livestock sheep only. The farm owns 3 tractors, 1 shared combine, 1 harrow, 2 rollers and 5 trailers. Upper Lea Farm; 404 acres, 329 owned, 25 rented, 30 borrowed. Arable normally wheat, barley, oats and oilseed rape are grown. Livestock 133 beef cattle, mainly Charolais and Hereford. The farm owns 3 tractors, 1 combine, 1 harrow, 1 roller, 7 trailers and bale handling equipment. Barton House; 193 acres, 177 owned.90 dairy cattle (Fresian) and 30 Hereford beef cattle.
